title: Having really high ping
body:
Recently since the new patch ive been having really bad ms starts at 33ms then spikes to 1200 ms and stays on most occasions. this game is unplayable for me as of right now.
I play other games such as CSGO, Over watch and more and i dont experience any of these issues. I know its not my internet or i'd be having issues with other games i play.  Ive ran some logs and here are my results  
Pinging www.google.com [172.217.10.100] with 32 bytes of data:
Reply from 172.217.10.100: bytes=32 time=471ms TTL=56
Reply from 172.217.10.100: bytes=32 time=466ms TTL=56
Reply from 172.217.10.100: bytes=32 time=680ms TTL=56
Reply from 172.217.10.100: bytes=32 time=391ms TTL=56

Ping statistics for 172.217.10.100:
    Packets: Sent = 4, Received = 4, Lost = 0 (0% loss),
Approximate round trip times in milli-seconds:
    Minimum = 391ms, Maximum = 680ms, Average = 502ms

replies.body:
Yeah those spikes are really high and if the're sudden it could be packet loss while trying to reach the game server.  ><  Routing is good, but you'll want to route to the NA game server specifically.  Download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a route to the game server: 104.160.131.1 for about 5 minutes.

That can help discover bumps along the way, but I'm confident the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide can help out here.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=9YJ2AAoU,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-05T18:01:57.588+0000)
>
> Yeah those spikes are really high and if the're sudden it could be packet loss while trying to reach the game server.  ><  Routing is good, but you'll want to route to the NA game server specifically.  Download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) and run a route to the game server: 104.160.131.1 for about 5 minutes.
> 
> That can help discover bumps along the way, but I'm confident the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide can help out here.

Heya, it looks like you're having moments of pretty severe packet loss and it's starting in your very own home.  I highly recommend running through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this, otherwise your connection will continue to degrade when it's already super high from the start.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=9YJ2AAoU,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-12-07T17:16:50.952+0000)
>
> Heya, it looks like you're having moments of pretty severe packet loss and it's starting in your very own home.  I highly recommend running through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot this, otherwise your connection will continue to degrade when it's already super high from the start.

i went through all the connection issue troubleshooting guide prior to this claim and still no results any other recommendations

Aw sorry to hear this is still a problem.  :(  No worries, grab some logs from the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can take a deeper look and find some more options for you.  See you there!
